attributes.action: Ban Caravans from the highways and byways of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every year, caravans cause hundreds of accidents, hundreds of hours of delays, and frustrate millions of motorists on our road network.
They are an eyesore when in transit and when not in use.
When they reach the end of their lives, they are an unlicensed, uncontrolled environmental nightmare.
By signing this petition, you are saying that you think a caravan- free UK would be a better place.
